## [See Also](/documentation/CoreData/NSManagedObjectContext/init()#see-also)

### [Deprecated instance methods](/documentation/CoreData/NSManagedObjectContext/init()#Deprecated-instance-methods)

[`init(concurrencyType: NSManagedObjectContextConcurrencyType)`](/documentation/coredata/nsmanagedobjectcontext/init(concurrencytype:))Creates a context that uses the specified concurrency type.Deprecated[`func lock()`](/documentation/coredata/nsmanagedobjectcontext/lock())Attempts to acquire a lock on the context.Deprecated[`func tryLock() -> Bool`](/documentation/coredata/nsmanagedobjectcontext/trylock())Attempts to acquire a lock.Deprecated[`func unlock()`](/documentation/coredata/nsmanagedobjectcontext/unlock())Relinquishes a previously acquired lock.Deprecated
